TopicTitle: Looks like an early Kerbal spacesuit.

Articles.Content:
Looks like something the Kerbals would design.

http://life.time.com/culture/37-weirdly-beautiful-science-and-tech-photos-from-life-magazine/?hpt=hp_c3#35
NASA`s first models where like that because they didnt know sh*t about how to construct space suits at the time
